MORE TRADE REGISTRATIONS: The American Bearing Manufacturers Association hired Drinker Biddle & Reath to lobby on “issues related to U.S. trade law and policy.” Meanwhile, Purolite Corporation, a manufacturer of high-performance resins, hired Sidley Austin to lobby on “proposed tariffs ion exchange resin from China.” In addition, Max Home, a Mississippi furniture manufacturer, hired Baker Donelson Bearman Caldwell & Berkowitz to lobby on the China tariffs, “specifically micro-denier suede fabrics.”
